named-query.name: User.findByLogin
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.login = (?1)

named-query.name: Task.findByUserAndCategoryActive
named-query.query: select t from Task t where t.user.id = (?1) and t.title = (?2) and t.finished = null

named-query.name: Category.findByUserAndName
named-query.query: select c from Category c where c.user.id = (?1) and c.name = (?2)
